title.narrative: Women and Youth Potential in Member-based Organisations (H-WYP)

description.narrative: Four core partner organisations (Okoro, WACU, MUMYO and UHOCU) have been supported to undertake gender audits and develop action plans to guide them for the remaining period of the year. Leadership of the partner organisations was sensitised on key areas to attend to in order to promote gender equality. Trainings alongside women empowerment initiatives have been planned for execution in the coming period. The organisation supported training 36 (27 F &9 M) gender TOT in 3 Core partners (Okoro coffee, WACHU and MUMYO )who will be further continue getting more support to take lead in supporting their organisation in promote gender equality work.

This partner targets four partner organisations working with We Effect in Uganda implementing rural development and adequate housing projects to ensure that gender equality and women empowerment components are strongly entrenched. It will ensure that the capacities of partners are enhanced in gender mainstreaming and implementing women focused empowerement inititives. This partner will facilitate partners' participation in advocacy forums related to their sectors. The partner will ensure increased visibility of We Effect partners in gender equality and women's empowerment forums. Further it will result to increased number of women and young people participating in rural development, housing and habitat sectors.

participating-org.narrative: National Association of Women Organizations in Uganda

activity-date.narrative: Planned end date of the activity
